caption: / The scene features a certificate from the Central Board of Film Certification of India, which is valid for theatrical release only. The certificate includes details such as the film title "DAJARO MASTANI," the rating "U" for all audiences, and the duration "150 min." The certificate also bears the Central Board emblem, the seal with the inscription "MINISTRY OF INFORMATION & BROADCASTING, GOVERNMENT OF INDIA," and is dated November 12, 2018. It is signed by an official from the Central Board of Film Certification of India, serving as official proof of the film's compliance with Indian censorship guidelines. / The certificate also lists the names of the applicant, Bhansali Productions, Mumbai, and the producer, Bhansali Productions India. / The certificate includes a logo reading "CBFC" in the upper right corner. / The certificate is signed by an official from the Central Board of Film Certification of India. / The certificate is valid for theatrical release only. / The certificate bears the Central Board emblem and the seal with / A group of soldiers in period attire are positioned near large cannons at dusk. The scene is illuminated by torches, casting a warm glow against the darkening sky. The landscape in the background features rolling hills, adding to the historical or epic atmosphere. The soldiers appear to be preparing for or engaged in a military operation. / The image shows a large group of people in a dark, possibly nighttime setting, lined up with multiple rows of heavy cannons that appear to be on the verge of being fired. Each row of cannons has at least 2 men beside each cannon, holding torches and wearing traditional Indian military uniforms with helmets. The cannons are dark-colored and appear to be made of metal, with two small fires burning atop each one, possibly representing flames. One torch on the left is bright orange and red, but the other torches are faint and appear as orange and yellow. The men are mostly obscured by the shadows, but they appear to be dressed in old-fashioned clothing and headwear, possibly made from leather, fur, or woven textiles. They seem to be prepared for battle, but it is difficult to discern their facial expressions or emotions. In the background, there are rolling mountains and a dark, cloudy sky that suggests the scene is set during either dawn or dusk. The overall atmosphere is tense and ominous. / A group of soldiers are standing in a line, holding torches. They are wearing traditional Indian military uniforms. . A warrior, clad in dark armor and a helmet, stands prominently in the foreground, brandishing a curved sword aloft against a dark, ominous sky. The scene features several other armored figures in the background, some holding spears, creating a tense and foreboding atmosphere, suggesting an impending battle or significant confrontation. The foreground includes a group of men wearing helmets and chainmail shirts, with a warrior in a brown tunic and chainmail shirt holding a sword, standing in front of them. The men are also holding flags, and the overall setting appears to be a battlefield.

. A woman in a traditional Indian wedding dress, adorned with gold accents, is standing confidently in front of a decorative backdrop. She is wearing a white veil over her dark hair, styled in an updo, and accessorizes with a large necklace. Her dress features a long train and a high neckline. She holds her hands in a dynamic pose, as if mid-dance movement. The background includes a stunning wall with intricate carvings and small candles, and two large fountains of clear water on either side. The lighting is soft and warm, with gold accents that match the bride's wedding dress, creating a festive and joyous atmosphere. The woman is also holding a red rose in her hand.

/ A man in white traditional Indian attire, including a long-sleeved white shirt, gray dhoti, and pearl necklaces, is standing in a room with wooden walls and intricate carvings. He is adorned with a ring on his right hand and is either standing or seated, surrounded by other men in similar attire. The atmosphere suggests a moment of quiet contemplation or celebration within a traditional Indian setting. / A man in white robes is walking in a room with other men in white robes, all standing in a line behind him. . A woman stands in a dimly lit, ancient chamber with a gothic architectural style. The room is filled with hanging chains and stone structures, creating a foreboding atmosphere. The sky is a mix of dark and light hues, adding to the scene's mysterious and somber mood. The woman is also wearing a long dress, adding a touch of elegance to the otherwise somber atmosphere. The room's grandeur is accentuated by tall pillars and arches, and the woman is surrounded by ropes hanging from the pillars, creating an air of mystery and intrigue. The scene invites the viewer to ponder the story behind this enigmatic figure, set against the backdrop of this historic and mysterious architecture.
